title: Erkek Severse
overview: Zeynep who lives with her twin children, is divorced from Oktay whom she married with great love during her university years. Oktay left Zeynep two years ago for Sena, a colleague at his work and plans to marry her. A series of coincidences brings Zeynep and Kenan, a well-known businessman together and they fall for each other. But Yelda, a prominent business woman has her eye on Kenan and will not sit back and allow her business partnership with Kenan which she plans to push toward marriage slip out of her hands.
